verses.text: And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* rose \w early|strong="H7925"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*; and they \w removed|strong="H5265"\w* from \w Shittim|strong="H7851"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, he and all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w lodged|strong="H3885"\w* there before they passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w*.

And it came to pass \w after|strong="H7097"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, that the \w officers|strong="H7860"\w* \w went|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H7130"\w* the \w host|strong="H4264"\w*;

And they \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, When ye \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w bearing|strong="H5375"\w* it, then ye shall \w remove|strong="H5265"\w* from your \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* it.

Yet there shall be a \w space|strong="H7350"\w* between you and it, about two \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* by \w measure|strong="H4060"\w*: come not \w near|strong="H7126"\w* unto it, that ye may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* by which ye must \w go|strong="H3212"\w*: for ye have not \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \add this\add* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w heretofore|strong="H8543"\w*.\f + \fr 3.4 \ft heretofore: Heb. since yesterday, and the third day\f*

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w Sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* yourselves: for to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w wonders|strong="H6381"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Take \w up|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, and pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. And they took \w up|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, This \w day|strong="H3117"\w* will I \w begin|strong="H2490"\w* to \w magnify|strong="H1431"\w* thee in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that they may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that, as I was with \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \add so\add* I will be with thee.

And thou shalt \w command|strong="H6680"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* that \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, When ye are \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w brink|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, ye shall stand \w still|strong="H5975"\w* in \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.

¶ And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Come \w hither|strong="H5066"\w*, and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Hereby ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \add is\add* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you, and \add that\add* he will without \w fail|strong="H3423"\w* drive \w out|strong="H3423"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, and the \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, and the \w Hivites|strong="H2340"\w*, and the \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w*, and the \w Girgashites|strong="H1622"\w*, and the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, and the \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*.

Behold, the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w* of all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* passeth \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you into \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.

Now therefore \w take|strong="H3947"\w* you \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* out of the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, out of \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.

And it shall come to pass, as soon as the \w soles|strong="H3709"\w* of the \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* that \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w* of all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, shall \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* in the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \add that\add* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \add from\add* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* that come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from \w above|strong="H4605"\w*; and they shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* upon \w an|strong="H0259"\w* \w heap|strong="H5067"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass, when the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w removed|strong="H5265"\w* from their \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*, to pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w bearing|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*;

And as they that \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* were \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, and the \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* that \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* were \w dipped|strong="H2881"\w* in the \w brim|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, (for \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w overfloweth|strong="H4390"\w* all his \w banks|strong="H1415"\w* all the \w time|strong="H3117"\w* of \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*,)

That the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* which came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from \w above|strong="H4605"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \add and\add* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* upon \w an|strong="H0259"\w* \w heap|strong="H5067"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w Adam|strong="H0121"\w*, that \add is\add* \w beside|strong="H6654"\w* \w Zaretan|strong="H6891"\w*: and those that came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* toward the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* of the \w plain|strong="H6160"\w*, \add even\add* the \w salt|strong="H4417"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w failed|strong="H8552"\w*, \add and\add* were cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w* right against \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*.

And the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* that \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w firm|strong="H3559"\w* on dry \w ground|strong="H2724"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, and all the \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w* on dry \w ground|strong="H2724"\w*, until all the \w people|strong="H1471"\w* were \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w clean|strong="H8552"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.
